description: Class president of the school where Luna transfers. She may sometimes sound cold and insensitive, but inside she`s a very good person. She plays the violin. When first on the Island she was the leader but after everyone voted for a new leader Luna was elected as new leader. Even so when Luna is not there Menori takes matters into her own hands. When Menori was little her mother died and her father taught her not to show her emotions to anyone.
name: Menori
